thread.section_title: Town Fair Tire Centers, Inc Reviews | Customer Service Reviews of Town Fair Tire Centers, Inc | www.townfairtire.com
thread.title: Customer Bob Karanian
thread.title_full: Town Fair Tire Centers, Inc reviewed by Customer Bob Karanian

author: Customer Bob Karanian
title: Customer Bob Karanian
text: Had just got some front and work done and needed an alignment. Went to Town Fair Tire and saw Jay. He set me up with a four wheel alignment and wheel balance at a very reasonable $100. Service was fast and I was done within an hour period definitely the best place to go for tires wheels and alignments.
